title: The Golden Hive
description: Wales, 1093 Descended of the Welsh Kings of Legend, Princess Nesta of Deheubarth was to shape history… Captured and taken hostage by the English King Rufus at the age of 11, Nesta is separated from her family and all that she knows. Raised in a foreign land, she uses her wits and beauty as a weapon. In the face of looming war, kidnap, violence and betrayal, Nesta fights for her freedom and to keep the secret of the one she loves… King Henry I.From the author of 'The White Seahorse' comes another sweeping tale featuring a little-known woman in history.
author: Eleanor Fairburn
